page.title: 15WIVENHOE 70 YEARS AGO
page.content: But it was good because they where already tumbling down old places and where Grosvenor House offices are now that used to be the Grosvenor Hotel, a huge big great hotel and when I was a little girl there were 22 pubs in Wivenhoe.We all had Gas in those days not electricity because it cost a lot of money in those days and we could only aford to have it downstairs. {Natasha:}How do you remember the Valley Estate and Dene Park and how have they changed? {Mrs Allen:}Valley road estate and Dene Park were sand pits when I was a child.When it snowed Bobbits Way was thick with snow and I used to sledge down there.
